bio.main_title: Systems Engineer with a Passion for Scalable Solutions
bio.description_1: With a solid foundation in Systems Engineering from
bio.description_1_suffix: , I specialize in building high-availability, concurrent web applications that scale.
bio.description_2: My expertise spans the entire stack, from designing robust REST APIs with enterprise-grade security to orchestrating containerized deployments in the cloud. I am passionate about solving complex problems and delivering solutions that exceed expectations.

academic.title: Academic Foundation
academic.desc: Systems Engineering from UNI with a focus on software architecture and distributed systems.

availability.title: High Availability
availability.desc: Expert in building fault-tolerant systems with 99.9%+ uptime guarantees.

concurrent.title: Concurrent Systems
concurrent.desc: Specialized in multi-threaded applications and asynchronous processing patterns.

contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to discuss opportunities? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.footer_note: I'm currently open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

messages.success_desc: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
messages.error_desc: Please try again later or contact me directly via email.

items.title: IT Manager
description: Developed and maintained Python/Django REST APIs to support internal operations and client-facing applications.
Built responsive UI components using Bootstrap and jQuery for improved user experience.
Managed virtualized server infrastructure with Proxmox, ensuring 99.9% uptime.
Implemented automated backup and disaster recovery procedures.

items.title: Freelance Developer
description: Designed and developed a scanner and inventory management application for livestock tracking.
Built robust backend services using Go for high-performance data processing.
Developed native Android application for mobile scanning and real-time inventory updates.
Implemented barcode/QR scanning functionality for efficient asset management.

items.title: Java Full Stack Developer
description: Designed and implemented secure REST APIs using Spring Boot and Spring Security with JWT authentication.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver mission-critical government applications.
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies for improved performance.
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers on best practices.

items.title: Jr. Programmer
description: Developed desktop applications for inventory management and business operations.
Designed and implemented database models using SQL Server for efficient data storage.
Built .NET applications with user-friendly interfaces for warehouse staff.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver solutions.

hero.description: Building high-availability, concurrent web applications with modern technologies and best practices.

items.title: Enterprise API Gateway
items.description: A high-performance API gateway built with Spring Cloud Gateway, featuring rate limiting, authentication, and request routing for microservices architecture.

items.title: Healthcare Management System
items.description: Full-stack healthcare platform with patient management, appointment scheduling, and secure medical records handling with HIPAA compliance.

items.title: CI/CD Pipeline Automation
items.description: Automated deployment pipeline using Jenkins and Kubernetes, reducing deployment time by 70% and ensuring zero-downtime releases.

metadata.title: Josué Reyes | Full-Stack Developer
metadata.description: Professional Full-Stack Developer specializing in high-availability web applications. Oracle Certified Professional with expertise in Java, Spring, Python, and Cloud.
